title: (x) Enoteca Carbonari - Harrington {David H}
content:
Hi  
Please tell me the font for this logo. It is very close to Rossetti, but not an exact match.  
Thank you!

 [‹ (x) "Ministry Resources" condensed Art Deco sans - Decotura {Garth}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080519014647/http:/typophile.com/node/18869 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Rexorama magazine stencil face - Cargo {Yves} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080519014647/http:/typophile.com/node/18864 "Go to next forum topic")
author: misalion

comments.content: Help! I cannot upload the image!

Fwiw, here is one that is based on Rossetti:

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/rassetta-nf/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080519014647/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/rassetta-nf/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/rassetta-nf/")

if you’d like you can e-mail me the graphic and I can put it on a webpage and make a link to it.

Use this [fp106@fontplay.com](mailto:fp106@fontplay.com) (a temporary throwaway address)
You must have the Flash 8 plug-in installed. Then directly below this box in which I’m currently typing you should see the words “Insert image”.
I downloaded Flash 8 Player and tried on Explorer, Safari, and Firefox. I still cannot upload. I am lost. What do I need to do?

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080519014647im_/http:/typophile.com/files/doestlooklikethis.png)

So you do not see this?

Tiffany!  
Thank you so much! All of a sudden I can do this... I am so happy!!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080519014647im_/http:/typophile.com/files/enoteca.jpg)
